content: Response: So you’re the kind of person who lets things slip through the cracks a bit—like leaving your keys on the counter or scrolling past deadlines because something shiny pops up. It’s cool, I get that vibe. Sometimes being a little careless can lead to unexpected detours and creative sparks, but if it starts throwing off your grind or piling up stress, you might want to play around with quick rituals to keep the chaos in check—maybe set a timer for just 5 minutes of focus before you jump into the next distraction. But hey, no one’s perfect; we all slip up now and then. What kind of stuff do you find yourself most careless about? Maybe we can figure out a hack that fits your style.
